trans-unit.source: Represents the base class for all exceptions caused by rule evaluation issues.
trans-unit.target: 表示由规则计算问题引发的所有异常的基类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error and takes into account the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数将新实例的 <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> 属性初始化为系统提供的消息，该消息描述错误并考虑当前系统区域性。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationException> 的实例的初始属性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Value
A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 `Nothing`）。

trans-unit.source: A system-supplied localized description.
trans-unit.target: 系统提供的本地化说明。

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: 描述错误的消息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationException" /> class with a specified error message.
trans-unit.target: 用指定的错误消息初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property of the new instance using the `message` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数用 <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> 参数初始化新实例的 `message` 属性。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationException> 的实例的初始属性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Value
A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 `Nothing`）。

trans-unit.source: The error message string.
trans-unit.target: 错误消息字符串。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> that holds the serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
trans-unit.target: 包含有关所引发异常的序列化对象数据的 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> that contains contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" />，它包含关于源或目标的上下文信息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationException" /> class with serialized data.
trans-unit.target: 用序列化数据初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called during de-serialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream.
trans-unit.target: 在反序列化过程中调用此构造函数来重建通过流传输的异常对象。

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: 描述错误的消息。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> that is the cause of the current <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> .
trans-unit.target: 导致当前 <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Exception" />。

trans-unit.source: If the <c>innerException</c> parameter is not a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic), the current <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> is raised in a catch block that handles the inner <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> .
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>innerException</c> 参数不是空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 <see langword="Nothing" />），则会在处理内部 <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> 的 catch 块中引发当前 <see cref="T:System.Exception" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationException" /> class, with a specified error message and a reference to the inner <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> that is the cause of this <see cref="T:System.Exception" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定错误消息和对导致此 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationException" /> 的内部 <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> 的引用初始化 <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Exception> that is thrown as a direct result of a previous <xref:System.Exception> should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 作为前一个 <xref:System.Exception> 的直接结果而引发的 <xref:System.Exception> 应在 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 属性中包括对前一个异常的引用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or a null reference (`Nothing`) if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner <xref:System.Exception> value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 属性返回的值与传递到构造函数中的值相同；或者，如果 `Nothing` 属性不向构造函数提供内部 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 值，则为空引用 (<xref:System.Exception>)。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationException> 的实例的初始属性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Value
The inner <xref:System.Exception> reference.
trans-unit.target: 内部 <xref:System.Exception> 引用。

trans-unit.source: The error message string.
trans-unit.target: 错误消息字符串。
